text.section: In this section, "financing statement" has the meaning stated in § 9-102 of the Commercial Law Article.
A person may not file a financing statement or an amendment to a financing statement that the person knows contains false information.

section.section: A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500.
Each act of filing a financing statement or an amendment to a financing statement is a separate violation.
